pageContent.descriptionText:
Welcome Welcome to the Otsuka Sales Accelerator Simulation.

In this fourth round of the simulation you’ll practice closing appropriately at each phase of the prescribing cycle.

This round of the simulation will include six decisions, and should take you 20 to 30 minutes. Each of the possible options you consider has been rated according to the following individual metrics. Your score will reflect whether your decision making is in line with these characteristics:

Scoring Metrics:
Customer’s Outcomes
  • Decisions will accelerate your customer's desired patient outcomes
  • Decisions will capture new opportunities for the customer

    • Sales Progress
  • Decisions build on previous discussions and align with where the customer is in their prescribing cycle
  • Decisions advance the sale by "closing" at multiple points in the prescribing cycle

    • Trusted Advisor Relationship
  • Decisions demonstrate a deep understanding of the customer's priorities and goals
  • Decisions genuinely engage the customer by partnering with the customer to create value
    • Please press or swipe the CONTINUE button below to get started.
